mapper.select: SELECT date_range.Date AS date, CASE WHEN rooms.room_number IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(rooms.room_availability) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN reservation.start_date <= date_range.Date AND reservation.end_date > date_range.Date THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) ELSE MAX(rooms.room_availability) END AS availableRooms FROM ( SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL n DAY) AS Date FROM for_count WHERE DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL n DAY) <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) ) AS date_range LEFT JOIN rooms ON rooms.room_number = #{roomNumber} LEFT JOIN reservation ON reservation.room_number = rooms.room_number AND reservation.status IN (0, 1) GROUP BY date_range.Date ORDER BY date_range.Date;

SELECT date_range.Date AS date, rooms.room_number AS roomNumber, MAX(rooms.room_availability) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN reservation.start_date <= date_range.Date AND reservation.end_date > date_range.Date THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS availableRooms FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{yearMonth}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL n DAY AS Date FROM for_count WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{yearMonth}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL n DAY, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ) AS date_range CROSS JOIN rooms LEFT JOIN reservation ON reservation.room_number = rooms.room_number AND reservation.start_date <= date_range.Date AND reservation.end_date > date_range.Date AND reservation.status IN (0, 1) WHERE rooms.room_number = #{roomNumber} GROUP BY date_range.Date, rooms.room_number ORDER BY date_range.Date, rooms.room_number;

SELECT date_range.Date AS date, rooms.room_number AS roomNumber, MAX(rooms.room_availability) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN reservation.start_date <= date_range.Date AND reservation.end_date > date_range.Date THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS availableRooms FROM ( SELECT DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL n DAY) AS Date FROM for_count WHERE DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL n DAY) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND DATE_SUB(#{endDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) AS date_range CROSS JOIN rooms LEFT JOIN reservation ON reservation.room_number = rooms.room_number AND reservation.start_date <= date_range.Date AND reservation.end_date > date_range.Date AND reservation.status IN (0, 1) WHERE rooms.room_number = #{roomNumber} GROUP BY date_range.Date, rooms.room_number ORDER BY date_range.Date, rooms.room_number;
